SEARCH
Package core.class_diagram

Class ClassDiagram

java.lang.Object
core.class_diagram.ClassDiagram
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClassDiagram extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a class diagram for storing class structures and relationships, and supports operations like adding, removing classes, relationships, and generating code.
See Also:

      public void removeRelationship(String startClass, String endClass, String type)
      Removes a relationship from the diagram by its details.
      Parameters:
      startClass - the starting class of the relationship
      endClass - the ending class of the relationship
      type - the type of the relationship

      public void removeRelations_of_a_Diagram(String className)
      Removes all relationships associated with a specific class from the diagram.
      Parameters:
      className - the name of the class whose relationships should be removed

    • getRelations_of_a_Diagram

      public ArrayList<Relationship> getRelations_of_a_Diagram(String className)
      Gets all relationships in the diagram that involve a specific class.
      Parameters:
      className - the name of the class whose relationships are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of Relationship instances
